revised_title: Herschel's Contributions to Understanding the Structure of the Universe
tldr: This article discusses the work of William Herschel, who made significant contributions to understanding the structure of the Universe. His surveys of the heavens and observations of the Milky Way and nebulae helped shape modern cosmological ideas. Despite the lack of distance measurement tools in the 18th century, Herschel's work laid the foundation for future advancements in astronomy and cosmology.
